main event: Three objects were sighted moving in an erratic manner over an Indianapolis suburb in May 1962.
interesting points: The objects were observed moving silently and erratically,They were described as round and metallic with no visible means of propulsion,One additional sighting reported four bright lights weaving in the sky,Jets were scrambled to intercept the lights but were unable to do so,The sighting involved two additional objects making a total of five observed.
sighted object: three round metallic objects and four bright lights
witness description: An individual and his wife with their children
